name: S.O.S: Sink or Swim
overview: You've really been dropped in at the deep end this time! The SS Lucifer is on a one-way trip to the seabed after colliding with an iceberg. It's jam-packed with panic-stricken passengers who are waiting for their hero, Kevin, to come to the rescue. Playing the part of Kevin, you have to guide the passengers through some of the worst hazards in modern game-playing before time runs out and the compartments flood.
